alert.note: Alert for Hanson; Lake; McCook; Miner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 2:42AM MDT until June 24 at 3:15AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lake County in east central South Dakota... Southeastern Miner County in east central South Dakota... Northwestern McCook County in southeastern South Dakota... Eastern Hanson County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 342 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Farmer to near Spencer In McCook County to Emery, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Canova around 350 AM CDT. Salem around 355 AM CDT. Winfred around 400 AM CDT. Madison and Orland around 410 AM CDT. Lake Herman State Park and Ramona around 415 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
